info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fisher County through 545 PM CDT... At 506 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Rotan, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamlin, Rotan, Roby, Sylvester, Hobbs, Mccaulley, Hitson and Us- 180 Near The Fisher-Scurry County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
